Name: Jumbled Fruit Julep
Instructions: MUDDLE strawberries and then mint in base of shaker (just to bruise mint). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: A fruity twist on the classic Julep.
History: Created in 2005 by Michael Butt and Giles Looker of Soulshakers, England. The contentious history of the Julep , along with its variants can be found on our page.
